SEARCH

All Classes and Interfaces

Class
Description
App
App is the main class of the project which purpose is to act as launcher for all the components of the game.
BoardFiller
BoardFiller is the abstract class whose subclasses are responsible for refilling the game board with random tiles when ever it is requested by the LivingRoom In order to implement this functionality we'll use a strategy pattern that incrementally fill the board based on the subtype of filler used
ChatMessage
ChatMessage is the serializable class that represent a message that a client can send on the chat
ChatUpdateMessage
ChatUpdateMessage is the class used by the server to notify clients of new messages in the chat
ClientHandler
clientHandler is the class server-side class that manages the connection with a client
ClientMain
ClientMain is the launcher of the Textual User Interface
ClientMessage
ClientMessage is the class that represents the generic message that a client can send
ClientState
ClientState is an enum used to identify the state of a client.
ColumnsGoal
This is ColumnsGoal.
CommonGoal
This class represents a common goal.
ConnectionErrorMessage
ConnectionErrorMessage is a message used to notify a disconnection from the server
ConnectionMessage
class of messages used to manage the connection
CornerGoal
This is the CornerGoal.
CreatedLobbyMessage
Represents a message indicating that a lobby has been created.
CreateLobbyMessage
CreateLobbyMessage is the class that represents a message that a client sends to the server in order to create a lobby
Data
Class that represents an information about the model that can be serialized ad exchanged via network
EightEqualsGoal
This is the EightEqualsGoal.
EqualGroupsGoal
This is EqualGroups.
ExistingLobbyException
ExistingLobbyException is an exception thrown when a client request the creation of an already existing lobby
ExistingLobbyMessage
Represents a message that the server sends to comunicate the currently available lobbies to the client
FinalGameInfo
FinalGameInfo is a class that represents the information exchanged via network that are relative to the final state if a game
FinalScreen
SceneFactory for the final screen, will generate the scoreboard and return the user to the starting screen when asked.
FourPlayerFiller
FourPlayerFiller is the concrete implementation of a BoardFiller responsible for refilling a game board for a four-player game
FullColumnException
FullColumnException is an exception thrown when a client request to add tiles in a shelf column such that the number of free space is less than the tiles number
FullDiagonalGoal
This is FullDiagonalGoal.
FullLobbyException
FullLobbyException is an exception that is thrown whenever a client try to join an already full lobby
FullLobbyMessage
Represents a message that the server sends to comunicate that the selected lobby is already full
Game
class Game represents an instance of the game MyShelfie, provides as public the methods to update the whole model.
GameBroker
This class represents the game broker.
GameCreatedMessage
Represents a message that the server sends to comunicate to the player that the game has started.
GameCreationException
GameCreationException is an exception that is thrown when an error occurs during the creation of a game.
GameEndedException
GameEndedException is an exception thrown whenever a client request to make an action in an already ended game
GameEndedMessage
Represents a message that the server sends to comunicate to the player that the game has ended.
GameInfo
GameInfo is the generic data that could be used to retrieve information about a game
GameResults
GameResults is a support class used to save the results of a game
GameScreen
Scene Factory for game creation and management of game interface, calls and updates.
GameScreenController
Controller for game scene, it will handle calls from GameScreen and apply updates to the elements shown.
GameUpdatedMessage
GameUpdatedMessage is a message that the server send to updates the clients about the game
GenericClient
abstract class that represents a client, all client subclasses will have the following implemented
GraphicalUI
Main Class for GUI based on JavaFX, extends JavaFx's application, implements SceneState to handle SceneFactories and ViewInterface to receive messages forwarding from client connection.
IllegalMoveException
IllegalMoveException is the exception that the server throw when a non-feasible move is requested
IllegalPlayerNameException
Is the exception thrown when a player request to use an empty or null String as name
IllegalPlayerNameMessage
IllegalPlayerNameMessage is a message that the server send to notify that the selected player name is not valid
InitialGameInfo
InitialGameInfo is a class of GameInfo that is used to represents all the information regarding the current game state Is used every time a client connect to a game to initialize the view
InsufficientPlayersMessage
InsufficientPlayersMessage is a message that the server send to notify that the there are not enough player to continue the game
InvalidCommandMessage
InvalidCommandMessage is a message that the server send to notify that the requested command is not valid
InvalidLobbyNameException
InvalidLobbyNameException is the exception thrown whenever the client request to create a lobby with empty or null name
InvalidLobbyNameMessage
InvalidLobbyNameMessage is a message that the server send to notify that the selected lobby name is not valid
InvalidMoveMessage
InvalidMoveMessage is a message that the server send to notify that the requested move is not allowed
InvalidPlayerNameException
InvalidPlayerNameException is an exception that is thrown whenever are requested information about an non-existent player
InvalidPlayerNumberException
InvalidPlayerNumberException is an exception thrown whenever a player request to create a game with a number of player different from 2,3 or 4
InvalidTileException
InvalidTileException is an exception that is thrown whenever a player request a tile that does not correspond to the respective one in the board
JoinedMessage
JoinedMessage is a message that the server send to notify that a player identified by "name" have joined a lobby
JoinMessage
JoinMessage is the class that represents the message that a client sends to the server in order to join a lobby
LivingRoom
Creating a class that represents the living room which contains the board and the two common goals.
Lobby
This class represents the lobby.
LobbyClosedMessage
LobbyClosedMessage is a message that the server send to notify that the a lobby have been closed
LobbyNotCreatedMessage
LobbyNotCreatedMessage is a message that the server send to notify that the creation of a lobby failed
LobbyScreen
Factory to produce the waiting screen scene
MenuScreen
Scene Factory for lobby creation and selection, users will be asked to prompt infos to create or join lobbies
Message
Message is the standard message that the server sends to a client and viceversa
MoveMessage
MoveMessage is the class that represents the message that a client sends to the server in order to try to make a move
NameTakenException
NameTakenException is thrown whenever a player ask for a name that is already taken in the lobby that he is trying to join
NameTakenMessage
NameTakenMessage is a message that the server send to notify that the requested name was already taken in the lobby
NoFreeEdgeException
NoFreeEdgeException is thrown when a requested move requires to take a tile that has no free edge
NonExistingLobbyException
NonExistingLobbyException is thrown whenever a client try to join a non-existent lobby
NotExistingLobbyMessage
NotExistingLobbyMessage is a message that the server send to notify that the requested lobby does not exists
NoTileLeftException
NoTileLeftException if the tiles contained in the bag ends.
NotInLineException
NotInLineException is an exception thrown whenever a move require to take tiles that are not on the same line
NotTestException
NotTestException is thrown whenever a debug constructor is invoked from outside a test class
NullTilesException
NullTilesException is the exception thrown whenever are requested operations involving a null tile
OutOfBoundException
OutOfBoundException is thrown whenever is attempted an action that may cause an index out of bound exception
PersonalGoal
PersonalGoal is an enumeration whose instances represents the 12 different type of personal goal present in the game The class has two private attributes: an array of int representing the points given by the card and an array of Tile representing the constraints that the player have to fulfill
Ping
message used by both client and server to ping each other and check the connection status
Player
Player is a class that models the player in a game.
PlayerNotCurrentException
PlayerNotCurrentException is thrown whenever a player request to make a move whe it's not his turn
PlayerNotInLobbyException
PlayerNotInLobbyException is thrown whenever a client requests an action that is only available inside a lobby but he still is inside the main menù
PlayerNotOnlineException
PlayerNotOnlineException is thrown whenever are required active actions on a player that is currently offline
PlayersEmptyException
PlayersEmptyException is thrown when trying to initialize a game without players
PlayScreen
First factory, handles starting screen and connection selection, connection creation will be handled at this stage
PrivateChatMessage
PrivateChatMessage is the subclass of ChatMessage used to represent a private message that a client sends
PrivateChatUpdateMessage
PrivateChatUpdateMessage is a message that contains the information about a private message.
QuitMessage
QuitMessage is the class that represents a message used to notify the server that the client wants to leave his current lobby
RetrievedLobbiesMessage
RetrievedLobbiesMessage is a message that the server send to the player to tell them all the available lobbies
RetrieveLobbiesMessage
RetrieveLobbiesMessage is the class that represents the messages that a client send to the server in order to ask for the currently available lobbies
RMIClient
rmi based implementation of the client
RMIClientInterface
public interface of a client used by the server to identify a client
RMIServer
is the server that concretely has to handle RMI connections with the players
RMIServerInterface
interface used for remote method invocation by the server and implemented by the client
RowsGoal
This is RowsGoal.
SceneFactory
Interface models abstract factory with product scene and next() method to build next factory
SceneHandler
SceneHandler gives to a SceneFactory the skeleton to handle scene production, includes a getter for scene used by the view, a method to adjust scaling and a base constructor.
SceneState
Interfaces implemented by GraphicalUI used by SceneFactories to call changes to current factory instance.
Server
This class represents the server.
ServerMain
ServerMain is a class used to launch the server
ServerMessage
ServerMessage is a generic message sent by the server
Shelf
class shelf represent a player's shelf
ShelfCreationException
ShelfCreationException is thrown whenever an error occurs during the initialization of a game related to a wrong number of player
SocketClient
socket based implementation of the client
SocketServer
is the server that concretely has to handle connections with the players via TCP sockets
TextualUI
TextualUI is the class that manages the whole TUI
ThreePlayerFiller
ThreePlayerFiller is the concrete implementation of a BoardFiller responsible for refilling a game board for a three-player game
Tile
Tile is the class that represents the tile object inside the program
TilesType
TilesType is an enumeration used to identify all the different types of tiles present in the game
TriangularMatrixGoal
This is the TriangularMatrixGoal.
TwoEqualSquareGoal
This is the TwoEqualSquareGoal.
TwoPlayerFiller
TwoPlayerFiller is the concrete implementation of a BoardFiller responsible for refilling a game board for a two-player game
UpdatedPlayerMessage
UpdatedPlayerMessage is a message that the server sends to notify that the current player have changed
UserDisconnectedMessage
UserDisconnectedMessage is a message that a client
ViewInterface
ViewInterface is the interface that every view need to implement in order to be compatible with the model and the controller.
VirtualPlayer
VirtualPlayer is a class used to masks a player.
XGoal
This is the XGoal.
